storyInfo: Silence enters the test site to care for the unconscious Ptilopsis, coming face to face with the Pioneers. Just as the deadlock is about to break, the group is attacked by strange creatures.

attributes.text: ...Sir, your insurance premiums for the month.
I mean, I just paid a few days ago...
Then we can only cover your prescription drug costs for the rest of the month, and the policy means you'll need to get a physical at a designated health care facility before the first of the month.
Th... They still haven't given me my loan...
I've been trying, damn it. If they'd just take my parents' deli as collateral, we'd be fine...
Sir, the payment is due tomorrow.

If you can't pay your premiums on time, then you definitely can't afford follow-up treatment. Considering your health and the social issues around it, your only option would be to move into an Infected treatment zone next month.
Don't worry. You'll enjoy even deeper discounts on health care there.

attributes.content: That's a dead end. My life would be over.
Sir...? Mr. Sonny?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Are you feeling alright? I heard how hard you were breathing.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: It's okay, I'm not going to hurt you.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I came here with Dr. Silence, and your men checked us over. We're not carrying any dangerous weapons.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Sorry. I just, uh, force of habit.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No need to apologize. I understand.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: It's always hard when the darkness creeps in.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Could you come a little closer? Body heat makes things much warmer. You won't go numb this way, even if you've got to sleep.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Where's the others?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Dr. Silence's medical drone installation has an emergency power source.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: She's inside the building right now giving Ptilopsis a health checkup, and Miss Elena's with them too.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Sam's...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: He's followed your plan. He got all the Pioneers in poorer health together, in there.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: On it.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Lemme ask you a favor. Don't tell Sam, or anyone, how I just, uh...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: You're their leader. If they thought your strength wasn't holding up at such a key moment, you could lose control of the Pioneer Team.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I'm not trying to say your team isn't united enough, but... the darkness usually has a way of pushing on variables.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: You've got a mile of experience.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I'm a Bolívarian. Blackouts were pretty common back in the city I'm from.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Bolívar... there's a war there?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We never had an easy guess for where the fires of war would stall out, back home.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Must've been hard for you. Getting yourself out of there, I mean.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: It was all thanks to my colleagues.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: The way I see it, you and your Pioneer Team are even more amazing.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Me... amazing? Hahah...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Wh-Why are you laughing?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: So those stupid company ads made it all the way down to Bolívar?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No, I don't mean like that.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: No matter how you look at it, you got here by your own two feet. And the ones who came before you, the immigrants from Victoria, Gaul, and Bolívar...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: It's their footprints all together that lit up these wilds.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Hah... you got a way with words.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Eh? I'm just telling it like it is.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I'd always wanted to see what the famous Columbian frontier was like.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Well, you disappointed? Might be more desolate than your hometown here.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No, Mr. Sonny, I think I've learned a lot.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: For example, the way your power lines are designed really is economical and efficient, just as Mechanist described.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Officer, the vehicle's ready.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Make sure you've got the right equipment.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I saw them with handmade crossbows.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Let it get a little darker, then send a few drones ahead to the Pioneer living quarters. Confirm the position of every hostage and bandit.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: We follow behind, and look for a good opportunity to bust in.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Then... what about Researcher Silence and that Rhodes Island operator?
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: What are you going for here?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I'm not sure which side they're on.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Is that how you Rhine Labbers work? You've gotta pick a side first no matter what you're doing?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: We just want to ensure all problems are resolved.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: That's what we do in Defense, Officer.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: And what I do is help people.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Listen, I don't care what you guys want to do. My advice is to make sure you don't get in the way of my job either.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: So you're saying it's Rhodes Islanders who saved you?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Rhodes Island didn't just save my life in the accident, they gave me the chance to continue my education.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I'm where I am today all because Rhodes Island changed my life.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Hahah... what a nice company.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Any other time and place, I would've thought you were running a recruitment drive.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Mr. Sonny—if you do have an interest, you can absolutely send your CV to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Me, a Pioneer, and looking like a kidnapper now... handing my CV to a company as fine as you're talking about?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Pretty funny joke there.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Humble yourself all you want, but I can still tell how much potential you got as an engineer.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Not to mention your three ladies in there... They're all Infected, and they still got hired by Rhine Lab? Do you know how tough that is?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Um... yeah, they definitely are outstanding...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: No, not just outstanding. They're one in a million. Top of their fields.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You got so many Infected each year, and only the tiniest number of talents ever get 'pardoned.'
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: But Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Yeah, Mr. Greyy, you want to tell me, 'Rhodes Island never gives terms that harsh when it saves people.'
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Even if I was willing to believe you, believe your special kind of faith in the company that saved your life, believe it was ready to go against its own nature, its self-interest and treat an Infected fair and square.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You still can't tell me you're not lucky to be one of the chosen ones.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: And the saps left over, they get round up to sit and wait until they drown in the mud. Their only other chance is to try taking a few steps, face up to bigger danger, and go looking for the tiniest place where just for a moment, they can rest their feet.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Them and me... we're all in the same boat. No soul to save us. Can't even save ourselves.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Olivia, do you really think this is going to help?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Joyce's brain activity indicators have stabilized somewhat.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I've administered some intravenous nervous depressants. That used to be a routine treatment method. The effect isn't especially ideal in this case, but...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Could her attack have had some other trigger?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Isn't she still in serious danger either way?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Yes. As long as we can't treat the cause, she needs a better care environment.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's great... but I'm not even asking about Joyce's condition.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You let Greyy and the Pioneer leader go on patrol together.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: That wasn't my decision. It was Greyy's own idea.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're the captain.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I haven't spent as much time on the Rhodes landship as you two have, but I know how the company works, Olivia. I'm not trying to criticize you...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: But if Greyy runs into trouble, or we're held up treating Joyce, you won't forgive yourself.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Do you believe Sonny would more easily trust Greyy, or us?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Is there a difference?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I recall you were unfortunate enough to catch Oripathy in a testing accident at Rhine headquarters.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Did it cross your mind at the time... that you might never be able to do research again?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Of course it did.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: But the boss—I mean, Ferdinand sent a new contract right out, extending the three years to ten, and giving me a thirty percent raise.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You were Employee of the Year.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yeah... not much of a consolation prize, right?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I mean, all the time I was getting treated at Rhodes Island, I ended up writing the director three entire conference papers.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I understand your perspective; I'm more or less the same.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm far less purely optimistic than you. I've worried about the future, and following from that, I was thankful to Parvis and Rhine Lab, for a time.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I... I've never doubted my own abilities, nor what they could do for Rhine Lab in return.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: For us, Oripathy is a challenge to overcome; it's not going to gnaw our entire lives away.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And that's why... Greyy can do what we can't.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mr. Sonny, I'd like to point out, there's a kind of contradiction in what you're saying.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: For real?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You say that the Pioneers risk it all in search of the next place to rest their feet...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: So how do you know we're not about to come across a way out?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Sir, the building—the power's back!
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: What the hell?!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Wait, you son of a gun—that's what you were doing the whole time you were talking to me?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Mr. Sonny...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: If I hadn't run out into the darkness back then, I wouldn't ever have met the Rhodes Islanders who came before me, carrying the light.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Trust me. Sometimes, taking one more step really does mean something.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Even if... I'm already standing on the brink?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: —Even if you've already jumped off.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: We've seen you reaching out your hand. You're crying out to us for help.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: So we'll do everything we can to catch you.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: No matter what you've been through, it's far from time to give up yet.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: We've got power!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Did Greyy... do it?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Hngh...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: That's a relief. Joyce is showing a reaction to the light.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Trust you to be so focused, even now.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Ladies.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Why are you back alone? Where's Greyy?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: This is the only place with power right now. He's making for the other quarters.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You don't trust me, do you?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Stay back!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Elena?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Olivia, you said he wouldn't trust us, but...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I have even less grounds to trust him.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: He tricked me and Joyce into coming here, and I've kept quiet on this the whole time... I saw more of them surrounding the labs.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: All of those Pioneers are armed!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's not what you think...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What do I think, huh? You said you didn't want to do anyone dirty! You mean you forgot how Dorothy's been treating you all?!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You're going to hurt her for your own selfish ends!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Is that...? Did you pull an alarm?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I've been planning to for a long time. I'm sure the police and my Defense colleagues are already on the way. They won't need any drones to pin our position now.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Much thanks to Greyy for this.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: So that's why he got the power back on...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Don't project your own gloomy mind on him.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Greyy really does want to help you, just like Dorothy and Joyce do.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Out of respect for them, I'll consider letting you off the hook.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sir, whatever plans you had before, give them up before it's too late.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Are the drones out?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Not yet. Our people are waiting for your order.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Then tell me... what the hell is that thing shining above the site?!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: So close. It'll all be good soon.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: That's some... goddamned beautiful light.
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Is it? Thank you...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Hahah... Got me feeling thawed out some, even, working with you here.
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Just that bit left in front now, right? We'll show those megacorpers! Cut whatever you want to us, we won't take it sitting down, not while we've still got our own two hands to get things done!
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Wait, something's wrong...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Hold on a second!
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: D—Don't go any further! That light isn't my Arts!
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Doc Silence.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'd like to ask just one more time. Are you really willing to trust a Pioneer?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I'm a doctor, and a researcher.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm like my colleagues—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: In that I trust the truth.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What's the deal outside?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: What are they all running for? Did you—
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: No, not on my orders.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Get away from me, you bastard—!
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Shit!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The police are probably here to rescue us.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: No, stay in here!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What the hell is wrong with you now—
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: My guess is, that thing's come again...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What thing?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Well, the... truth, I wanted to tell you about.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Elena, keep away from the door!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sir—s—sir...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Got...ta watch... out...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Has he been hurt? Or is he... having an attack?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Stay away from him.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Your teammate is clearly in need of assistance!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Watch what's behind him—
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: An irregularly shaped object hangs in the air.
Its surface is exceptionally glossy, issuing gentle silver rays all about, and it hovers faintly up and down at this moment, as if following some sort of breathing pattern.
After rising up behind the Pioneer, about three seconds pass where it hangs in the air.
Then immediately, it slowly rotates its own body, as if curiously assessing every human at the scene.
This... It's...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Run!!!
attributes.name: Sonny
